archimate:Requirement.name: 4.46.1 Performance monitoring control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The performance of business applications, systems and networks should be monitored: against agreed targets by reviewing current utilization of sys-tems at normal and peak periods using automated monitoring software that generates alerts (e.g. via a man-agement console, email messages or SMS text messages to mobile tele-phones) based on predefined thresh-olds by reviewing event logs relating to system and network activity regularly (e.g. to identify poor response times, lack of network bandwidth or delays in voice traffic) by investigating bottle-necks/overloads, including network queuing, latency levels and network jitter.
